description:
Craig's Secretary is your dedicated assistant when it comes to searching CraigsList. Tell CS what items you want to search for, set filter criteria, and how often to do the search, and Craig's Secretary will search CraigsList, and notify you of new results. 

Easily scroll through listings, or reply to poster with one tap. 
Flag postings for viewing later. Double Tap to zoom in on photos or other text, just like when using the web browser.

To get started doing a quick search, enter search location, category, and search phrase. Then press Search. CS will search CraigsList for appropriate matches. Or, save as an auto search by entering the duration. 

To alter saved searches, go to auto searches, and tap on appropriate saved search. 

To flag a result, press the flag button when viewing a result. 

Updates: 1.0.5:  1.) CS Pro now remembers your last location, so you needn't enter it each time. 2.) Supports landscape mode. 3.) Fixed bug where auto searches couldn't be deleted. 4.) Added the ability to select 12 hour and daily searches.
Update 1.08: Fixed bug that disabled auto search. Also lowered price.
Next update will allow background auto searches.
